maqras.text: Nefka yasen imeddukwal i sen icebbeen ayen illan zdat sen, akked wayen illan deffir sen. Iuao fellasen wawal ger leoyus n yimdanen akw n leonun, i i$aben, uqbel nnsen. Ih, nitni d imexsuoen
Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur ssemeaset i Leqwoan agi. Ssekret fellas, ta$wegwa, ahat a prebeem
A Nessukk $ef wid ijehlen, aaaqeb uqsie. A ten Nqeiii sennig wayen xeddmen
D wagi ay d aqeiii icenga n Oebbi: times; i nitni degs axxam n lebda; d aqeiii, imi la nekoen issekniyen nne£
Ad inin, wid ijehlen: "a Mass nne$! Essken a$ wid i $ i$elien, d loenn ne$ d amdan; a ten neokev, ad u$alen seg wid indellen mavi
Ih, wid innan: "Mass nne$ d Oebbi", sinna, nudan lewqama, a d rsent $uosen lmalayek: "ur ppagwadet, ur $webblet; ppubeccoet s Loennet i wen ippuwaaaden
Nekwni d imawlan nnwen di tmeddurt n ddunit u di laxeot. Dinna, i kunwi, ayen i cedhant teowiein nnwen. Dinna, i kunwi, ayen tessutrem
D tarusi s$uo Win Ipsemmieen, Ipeunun
Anwa yifen awal umain n win inaaoen Oebbi, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, id innan: "nek, ih, seg imvuaen
Ur iaadil ise$ akked tucmip. Err ip akin, s wayen ip yifen. Ma tella cceena, garak d yiwen, ad iu$al d aebib i k ieemmlen
Ur teppunefk siwa i wid iuebboen. Ur teppunefk, siwa i bu sser abarar
Ma iccacev ak Cciian tuccva, ssuter laanaya n Oebbi. Ih, Neppa d win Isellen, d Amusnaw
Seg issekniyen iS, ass akked yiv, iiij akked waggur. Ur kennut ara i yiiij, ne$ i waggur. Knut i Oebbi, iten id Ixelqen, ma d Neppa ay taabbdem
Ma zuxxen, ihi, wid illan ar Mass ik, sbuccuaen T iv akked wass, ur aaggun
Seg issekniyen iS: a pwaliv, kecc, akal iqquo; lemmer ad as Nesse$li aman, a d iakwi, ad icuff. Win it id Issadren, d Win ara d Issidren lmeggtin. Ih, Neppa, Izmer i yal cci
Ih, wid issexuaoen issekniyen nne£, ur drigen fellane£. Menyif win ara ipwaveggoen ar tmes, ne$ win ara iasen di laman, ass n tnekra? Xedmet ayen i wen ihwan. Neppa, s tidep, Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Akka, wid inekoen asmekti, mi ten id iusa, u neppat ard Tazmamt tuzmirt
Ur d iusi le$wlav zdat es, ne$ deffir es. D tarusi s$uo Bab n uuwab, Amaazuz
Awal i k id iusan, d win kan id iusan imazanen, uqbel ik. Mass ik, ih, ard Bab n ssmae, d Bab uaaqeb aqeoean

Lemmer Nerri Leqwoan s tmeslayt tabeooanit, a d inin: "lemmer feuulen issekniyen iS s wawal abeooani, u s taaoabt"? Ini: "neppa, i wid iumnen, d nnhaya u d ccafuaa. Wid ur numin ara, aaegent tmejjin nnsen. Neppa, i nitni, d tider$elt. Widak pwanecden seg umkan ibaaden
Ni$ Nefka yas Tazmamt i Musa. Mgarraden fellas. Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal s$uo Mass ik, yili tefra garasen. Nitni, fellas, di ccekk imcebbwel
Win ixedmen ayen ilhan, i iman is; win iccven, mgal iman is. Mass ik ur Idennis ara imdanen
